name: One Fat Cigar
tag_list: actor-jobs, actress-jobs, film-industry, film-career, imdb, tv-production-jobs, video-production-jobs, post-production-jobs, production-jobs, love-film, trama-film, top-film-schools
overview:
OneFatCigar.com is a worldwide social network for people who love film and produce films. It allows film industry professionals (actor, writer, producer, director, composer, production company or film crew) to reach an “imdb film” audience who want to go behind the scenes on major productions.

Follow the exciting daily life of producers, directors, actors around the world. Be updated from the production team - day 1 of script, through the financing process, attaching the director, casting calls and auditioning the actors, announcing production jobs and recruiting the crew. Producers can upload interviews with key cast and crew, allowing their audience to learn more about the process of making films.

Film Industry jobs are advertised on the site for members - whether they are interested in actor jobs, actress jobs or behind the scenes positions (video production jobs, television production jobs and post production jobs - runner etc) or simply looking for their first break - there are a range of potential film career opportunities from semi-pro to seasoned professionals.

One Fat Cigar is for anybody who is serious about film making, or simply love film.
